item.description:
@TimeRS3 wrote:

Team_Rocket:

Guys, you can name your Packages/Containers whatever you like. Even though It’s bad practice to spell things incorrectly; doesn’t mean It’s wrong. This doesn’t break procedure.

Thank you

was going to say there’s alot of things that really shouldn’t be the way it is but it happens in this revision.

Anyways if you need help ask here don’t pm i never answer those.

GOD kids these days with there stupidity[/quote]

item.title: Troll Invasion Minigame
item.dc:creator: @TimeRS3 TimeRS3
item.description:
@TimeRS3 wrote:

I noticed someone released my troll invasion minigame so might aswell let you all have it too.

So lets get started,

go to src<com<rs<game<player<controlers

Download this file and place it there ---- > https://dl.dropbox.com/s/nktv7prakszv1df/trollinvasion.rar?dl=1

now open up player.java and find this

Under it Add public boolean trollReward; private int trollsToKill; private int trollsKilled;

Now find this public void setDisableEquip(boolean equip) { disableEquip = equip; }

And add this under it [CODE]public int getTrollsKilled() {
return trollsKilled;
}

public int getTrollsToKill() {
	return trollsToKill;
}

public int setTrollsKilled(int trollsKilled) {
	return (this.trollsKilled = trollsKilled);
}

public int setTrollsToKill(int toKill) {
	return (this.trollsToKill = toKill);
}

public void addTrollKill() {
	trollsKilled++;
} [/CODE]

Okey now open up the world class , Find this public static final Player getPlayerByDisplayName(String username) {

Under it add public static NPC getNPC(int npcId) { for (NPC npc : getNPCs()) { if(npc.getId() == npcId) { return npc; } } return null; }

now open up control handler class and add the imports

And the handler handledControlers.put("TrollInvasion", (Class<Controler>) Class.forName(TrollInvasion.class.getCanonicalName()));

And i forgot the npc CombatDefinitions Open ur unpackedCombatDefinitionsList
and add

//Trolls 11406 - 1000 13786 13787 13785 5 5 60 240 MELEE -1 -1 AGRESSIVE 11410 - 1000 13786 13785 13785 5 5 60 270 MELEE -1 -1 AGRESSIVE 11407 - 1000 13786 13787 13785 5 5 60 240 MELEE -1 -1 AGRESSIVE 13406 - 800 13786 13787 13785 5 5 60 260 MELEE -1 -1 AGRESSIVE 12295 - 1400 13788 13787 13785 5 5 60 270 MELEE -1 -1 AGRESSIVE 12374 - 1400 13788 13787 13785 5 5 60 270 MELEE -1 -1 AGRESSIVE 12902 - 700 13786 13787 13785 5 5 60 270 MELEE -1 -1 AGRESSIVE 12884 - 1200 13786 13787 13785 5 5 60 270 MELEE -1 -1 AGRESSIVE 13692 - 1200 13790 13787 13785 5 5 60 400 MELEE -1 -1 AGRESSIVE 13720 - 200 13791 2123 13785 5 5 60 400 MELEE -1 -1 AGRESSIVE 12291 - 1200 13788 13789 13785 5 5 60 400 MELEE -1 -1 AGRESSIVE 13665 - 800 2125 13787 13785 5 5 60 290 MELEE -1 -1 AGRESSIVE 13669 - 800 2125 13787 13785 5 5 60 290 MELEE -1 -1 AGRESSIVE 13689 - 1200 13790 13789 13785 5 5 60 290 MELEE -1 -1 AGRESSIVE 13381 - 1500 1932 1935 1934 5 5 60 450 MELEE -1 -1 AGRESSIVE 13658 - 1200 2134 13787 13785 5 5 60 270 RANGE -1 -1 AGRESSIVE 13661 - 1000 2134 13787 13785 5 5 60 250 RANGE -1 -1 AGRESSIVE 13660 - 1000 2134 13787 13785 5 5 60 300 RANGE -1 -1 AGRESSIVE 12435 - 800 1938 13792 13785 5 5 60 290 MAGE -1 -1 AGRESSIVE //Thrower Troll - 67 1101 - 950 2134 13787 13785 4 2 60 90 RANGE -1 -1 AGRESSIVE 1102 - 950 2134 13787 13785 4 2 60 90 RANGE -1 -1 AGRESSIVE 1103 - 950 2134 13787 13785 4 2 60 90 RANGE -1 -1 AGRESSIVE 1104 - 950 2134 13787 13785 4 2 60 90 RANGE -1 -1 AGRESSIVE 1105 - 950 2134 13787 13785 4 2 60 90 RANGE -1 -1 AGRESSIVE //Mountain troll - 69 1106 - 900 2125 13787 13785 6 2 60 121 MELEE -1 -1 AGRESSIVE 1107 - 900 2125 13787 13785 6 2 60 121 MELEE -1 -1 AGRESSIVE 1108 - 900 2125 13787 13785 6 2 60 121 MELEE -1 -1 AGRESSIVE 1109 - 900 2125 13787 13785 6 2 60 121 MELEE -1 -1 AGRESSIVE 1110 - 900 2125 13787 13785 6 2 60 121 MELEE -1 -1 AGRESSIVE 1111 - 900 2125 13787 13785 6 2 60 121 MELEE -1 -1 AGRESSIVE 1112 - 900 2125 13787 13785 6 2 60 121 MELEE -1 -1 AGRESSIVE //Troll general - 113 1115 - 1500 13791 13787 13785 5 2 60 386 MELEE -1 -1 AGRESSIVE 1116 - 1500 13791 13787 13785 5 2 60 386 MELEE -1 -1 AGRESSIVE 1117 - 1500 1938 13787 13785 5 2 60 386 MELEE -1 -1 AGRESSIVE

Hope you enjoy
